description.value: Sometimes referred to as an alley bow by rogues or ruffians, this small crossbow fires small bolts that are sometimes used to deliver poison to the target. It's small enough to be shot one-handed, but it still requires two hands to load.
A mix of flexible and molded boiled leather, a suit of this type of armor provides some protection with maximum flexibility.
Providing the same defensive function as a standard gauntlet, this version has a group of spikes protruding from the knuckles to deliver piercing damage with a punch.
An invisibility potion is colorless and oddly lightweight. Upon drinking it, you gain the effects of a 2nd-level invisibility spell.
A healing potion is a vial of a ruby-red liquid that imparts a tingling sensation as the drinker's wounds heal rapidly. When you drink a healing potion, you regain [[/r 2d8+5]] Hit Points.
Devargo deals an extra [[/r {1d6}[precision]]]{1d6 precision damage} to flat‑footed creatures.
Devargo isn't flat‑footed to creatures of 5th level or lower that are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Hidden]{Hidden}, undetected, flanking, or using surprise attack.

Trigger A creature within Devargo's melee reach is hit by a melee attack from one of his allies

Effect Devargo makes a Strike against the triggering creature with a -2 penalty to the attack roll. He can't deal sneak attack damage on this Strike. After this Strike, Devargo can Stride without triggering reactions.

This venom erodes its target's defenses, aiding the spider in securing prey.

Activate D Interact (Injury)

Saving Throw Fortitude

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 [[/r 1d10 #poison]]{1d10 poison damage} and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r 1d12 #poison]]{1d12 poison damage}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1}, and flat-footed (1 round)

Stage 3 [[/r 2d6 #poison]]{2d6 poison damage}, clumsy 2, and flat-footed (1 round)
You spring into combat faster than foes can react. On the first round of combat, if you roll Deception or Stealth for initiative, creatures that haven't acted are flat-footed to you.
Shorter than traditional arrows but similar in construction, bolts are the ammunition used by crossbows.
